Comment.Language: For weekdays of the Great Fast, the response to the Gospel is chanted in the weekdays tune of the fast:

Text.Language: }hir/n/ n~te V]: y/et[oci e~nouc niben: ece~a~reh e~netenh/t: qen Pi,~rictoc I/couc Pen[oic.
The peace of God which surpasses, all understanding, will guard your hearts, in Christ Jesus our Lord.
سلام الله الذي يفوق كل عقل يحفظ قلوبكم بالمسيح يسوع ربنا.
Aiernobi aiernobi: Pa[oic I/couc ,w n/i e~bol: je m~mon bwk n~aternobi: oude m~mon [oic n~at,w e~bol
I have sinned, I have sinned. My Lord Jesus, forgive me; for there is no servant without sin, nor master without forgiveness.
أخطأت أخطأت يا ربي يسوع إغفر لي لأنه ليس عبد بلا خطية ولا سيد بلا مغفرة.
